Hi all,
Just wanted to let you know we've started this page on embedding Heritrix.

http://crawler.archive.org/cgi-bin/wiki.pl?EmbeddingHeritrix

It's just a start, but it might help if you are at the beginning. Comments, 
corrections, additions welcome, to either me or St. Ack.

Thanks,
Shifra
